text: Ara ya kichu rayeche asamana samuhe o yamine saba'i allahara. Bastutah ami nirdesa diyechi tomadera purbabarti granthera adhikariderake ebam tomaderake ye, tomara saba'i bhaya karate thaka allahake. Yadi tomara ta na mana, tabe jeno, se saba kichu'i allaha taâ€™alara ya kichu rayeche asamana samuhe o yamine. Ara allaha hacchena abhabahina, prasansita.
